## Installation

Once it is available, you can install the released version of `ouroborus` from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
#install.packages("ouroborus")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("asshah4/ouroborus")
```
